meanings.definition: A type of game played in the snow.
meanings.sent1: During winter, children enjoy playing snowsnake in the park.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered outside to play a fun game of snowsnake.
meanings.sent3: The snowsnake slithered through the white blanket of snow, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent4: The snowsnake game was a slippery adventure through the icy terrain.
meanings.sent5: The colorful snowsnake left a trail of laughter and excitement in its path.

meanings.definition: A long, slender piece of wood used in the game of snowsnake.
meanings.sent1: The kids crafted a snowsnake from a smooth branch found in the forest.
meanings.sent2: He aimed the snowsnake carefully, ready to send it sliding down the snowy track.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the snowsnake for a tasty treat and tried to nibble on it.
meanings.sent4: The snowsnake moved gracefully, like a dancer twirling on the frozen stage.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the snowsnake made it stand out among the other game pieces.

meanings.definition: To participate in the game of snowsnake.
meanings.sent1: Everyone wanted to snowsnake together on the weekend.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to snowsnake quickly and joined the friendly competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to snowsnake with the kids but ended up causing chaos in the game.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm to snowsnake was contagious, spreading joy to all players.
meanings.sent5: The whole neighborhood gathered to snowsnake, creating a festive atmosphere in the snow.
